function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of scientifically sound data on spatial-temporal activity-travel behavior and its association with COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of disease propagation and limited effectiveness of mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies to gather reliable data on activity-travel behavior and its relation to disease spread","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis techniques, spatial modeling","People":"Population residing in built environments, individuals with different activity-travel behavior","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Costly and time-consuming nature of diary surveys for capturing activity-travel behavior","Impact":"Limited availability of comprehensive data for disease transmission modeling","Mitigation":"Explore alternative data collection methods such as automated tracking systems and digital diaries","Technologies":"Automated tracking systems, digital diary applications","People":"Research participants, population in the built environment","Owner":"Researchers, data collection agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of spatial adjacency and social network relationships in hospital facility models","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of disease transmission dynamics within healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Develop and integrate advanced models that capture spatial adjacency and social network relationships","Technologies":"Space-time activity-based models, social network analysis, spatial modeling","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors in hospital facilities","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, researchers"}]}
